name: Haunted Cat
description:
Made for the Gdevelop Jam #2  with PETS Theme

A small survival game where you have to fight only with your flashlight and your loyal pet the cat. But be careful not to use your flashlight a lot, then you will be an easy target for ghosts...

Liluo Link:
https://liluo.io/salmo23/haunted-cat

How to play:
ASDW to move
Rotate mouse to rotate FLASHLIGHT
Click to Turn on/off the FLASHLIGHT

Gameplay:

Use your flashlight to reveal the ghosts, this will make them stop and shrink until they disappear.

Try not to spend too much time with the flashlight on so the battery doesn't run out fast. (you can turn it off/on using the Click)

Batteries will appear on the map that you can pick up to recharge your flashlight

The cat has a special one which is loading over time, when it is full you can use it by clicking the CAT or the IMAGE.

Helping a child to reach the obelisk will reduce the time of the game and heal your life
